author: pdobacz
content: when you have a moment can you point to the bugfix and also a specific example of a bc test which triggered the failure? It seems like we only have that bit of coverage in the new blockchain tests, which actually might be ones be coming from an "auxiliary" filling tool. So maybe there's a test to add to the main EEST test set, in order to cover this more properly.
